title: Neechan wa Chuunibyou - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Supernatural
tags: Assassins   Beautiful Female Lead   Brother Complex   Caring Protagonist   Chuunibyou   Dense Protagonist   Doting Older Siblings   Game Elements   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Abilities   Lack of Common Sense   Magic   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Siblings   Special Abilities   Vampires   Yandere
author: Tsuyoshi Fujitaka   藤孝剛志
description: One day, first year high school student Yuichi Sakaki suddenly awakens the power of “Soul Reader” within him, and he can see words above peoples heads that describe their true nature! With just a glance at the people around him, he sees crazy things like “Zombie”, “Witch”, and “Vampire”... That would be bad enough, but then there is “Serial Killer” Natsuki Takeuchi walking straight toward him... Nobody would ever believe him! Well, except for his older sister Mutsuko: This kind of stuff is right up her alley.>
